doc:
William P. Carleton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_P._Carleton 0 William P. Carleton (October 3, 1872 – April 6, 1947) was a silent film actor who appeared in 40 films between 1919 and 1944. He is sometimes billed as William Carleton Jr.. Carleton was born in , London and was briefly married to actress Toby Claude; they divorced in 1903. He was a distant cousin of Sir Guy Standing and other Standing acting family members. He died in Hollywood, California. William_P._Carleton ( October_3_,_1872 – April_6_,_1947 ) was a_silent_film_actor who appeared in 40_films between 1919_and_1944 . He is_sometimes_billed as William_Carleton_Jr. . Carleton was_born in , London and was_briefly_married to actress_Toby_Claude ; they divorced in 1903 . He was a_distant_cousin of Sir_Guy Standing and other_Standing acting family_members . He died in Hollywood , California .
